summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 25163, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Lucile Street, from the viaduct to Thirteenth Avenue South, and Thirteenth Avenue South, from the center line of Findlay Street to the north margin of Dawson Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway sixteen (16) feet in width, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2848 of the City Council of The City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle, approved September 29th, 1910.
